extracted-table.table-caption: Task-related fMRI data during encoding and retrieval.

caption.p: Task-related fMRI data during encoding and retrieval.

td.bold: (A) Main effect of memory during encoding (E_C > E_F)
(B) Main effect of memory during retrieval (R_C > R_F)

table-wrap-foot.attrib: (A) Difference between subsequently remembered object-location associations and subsequently forgotten object-location associations during encoding (E_C > E_F) and (B) Difference between correctly retrieved object-location associations and forgotten object-location associations during retrieval (R_C > R_F). Clusters are reported at p < 0.001, uncorrected, with an extent threshold of k > 10 voxels. Clusters whose peak survived a threshold of p-FWE < 0.05 are highlighted in bold print. L, left; R, right; IOG, inferior occipital gyrus; vmPFC, ventromedial prefrontal cortex; IFG, inferior frontal gyrus; MTG, middle temporal gyrus.

extracted-table.table-caption: Changes in functional connectivity between R1 and R3.

caption.p: Changes in functional connectivity between R1 and R3.

tr.th: (A) FC score differences between R3 and R1

td.bold: (B) Post hoc t-test results, p-values corrected for multiple comparisons (Bonferroni)

table-wrap-foot.attrib: (A) Mean differences (M) and standard errors (SE) of the differences between R3 and R1 (Δ R3-R1) of the FC between ROI 1 and ROI 2. ROI 1 was defined as a region showing a subsequent memory effect during encoding. ROI 2 represents regions that showed a significant increase in FC with ROI 1 during undisturbed consolidation. (B) Post hoc t-test results comparing the mean differences of FC between the three conditions (C, RE, and IN). Results are corrected for multiple comparisons using Bonferroni correction. IOG, inferior occipital gyrus; C, control; RE, reminder; IN, interference. Significant differences at p < 0.05 are marked with an asterisk and with two asterisks at p < 0.01.

extracted-table.table-caption: Changes in functional connectivity between R1 and R2.

caption.p: Changes in functional connectivity between R1 and R2.

table-wrap-foot.attrib: Presented are the mean differences (M) and standard errors (SE) of the FC scores between regions of interest for R1 and R2 for the three experimental conditions and the results of the paired t-tests.
